snippet: A few months ago, Representative Paul D. Ryan was just another up-and-coming member of the House of Representatives. Now the vice presidential nominee is holding office hours for his colleagues.
abstract: A few months ago, Representative Paul D. Ryan was just another up-and-coming member of the House of Representatives. Now the vice presidential nominee is holding office hours for his colleagues.

headline.main: Paul Ryan Gets His Own Meet-and-Greet Room on Capitol Hill
